name: Rollin' Gun
summary: The world moved on, rebuilt from the ashes of a war long forgotten. But some battles never end. An old war hero—scarred, forgotten, but unbroken— rolls into town, ready for one last fight. Bound to a wheelchair but still a force to be reckoned with, he takes up arms once more to protect a land that no longer remembers his name. Face relentless waves of supernatural foes, as an aging gunslinger who refuses to lay down his arms in this low-fantasy Western with unique challenging controls.
